title: feature request: unify tensor constructor interface for both CPU and GPU
body_html:
1. add para device to constructor of torch.Tensor() and etc. For example,
    x_tensor = torch.Tensor(np.random.rand(3,5), device=0)

  2. add attr. device to Tensor and etc. so we can check a tensor resides on which device, for example
    device = x_tensor.device

body:
1) add para `device` to constructor of `torch.Tensor()` and etc.  For example, 
     `x_tensor = torch.Tensor(np.random.rand(3,5), device=0)`

2) add attr. `device` to `Tensor` and etc. so we can check a tensor resides on which device, for example
     `device = x_tensor.device`
